faq.q: What's the difference between bold fonts and regular bold text?
faq.a: Our bold uses Unicode Mathematical Bold characters, which are distinct Unicode symbols, not just styled text. This means they work consistently across all platforms, even where CSS styling isn't available.

faq.q: Can I use bold fonts in social media bios?
faq.a: Yes! Bold fonts are perfect for social media bios, post captions, and anywhere you need text to stand out. They work great on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, and TikTok.

faq.q: Are bold fonts good for headlines?
faq.a: Absolutely! Bold fonts are ideal for blog post titles, article headers, and news headlines. They ensure your content catches readers' attention immediately.

faq.q: Will bold fonts work in email subject lines?
faq.a: Yes, bold Unicode characters work in most email clients' subject lines. They can help your emails stand out in crowded inboxes.

faq.q: Can I combine bold fonts with other styles?
faq.a: You can use bold fonts alongside other text, but each font style is independent. For mixed styling, you'd need to generate separate sections in different styles. Check out our tattoo font generator or gothic font generator for more bold options, or browse our font generator tools.
